paymentFailed: To'lov amalga oshmadi. Iltimos, qayta urinib ko'ring.
suggestedLanguageMessage: Siz {languageName} tilida ko'rishni afzal ko'rishingizni payqadik. O'zgartirishni xohlaysizmi?

pizza.name: Pepperoni Pitssa
pizza.description: Klassik pepperoni pitssasi boy tomat sousi va motsarella pishloqi bilan.

burger.name: Chizburger
burger.description: Chedder pishloqi, salat bargi, pomidor va maxsus sous bilan suvli mol go'shtidan kotlet.

sushi.name: Lososli Sushi To'plami
sushi.description: Yangi lososli sushi va rollar, soya sousi, vasabi va zanjabil bilan tortiladi.

pasta.name: Spagetti Karbonara
pasta.description: Panchetta, tuxum va Parmesan pishloqi bilan qaymoqli spagetti.
